text:
Train services are being extended tonight on the eve of Deepavali (17 Oct).

Last train timings:

NSL/EWL
- towards both directions: departs City Hall at 12.30am

CCL
- towards Harbourfront: departs Dhoby Ghaut at 11.55pm
- towards Dhoby Ghaut: departs Harbourfront at 11.30pm

NEL
- towards Punggol: departs Dhoby Ghaut at 12.39am
- towards Harbourfront: departs Dhoby Ghaut at 12.25am

DTL
- towards Bukit Panjang: departs Chinatown at 12.37am
- towards Chinatown: departs Bukit Panjang at 11.59pm

SKLRT
- departs Sengkang at 1.05am
PGLRT
- departs Punggol at 1.07am
BPLRT
- departs Choa Chu Kang at 1.29am

Bus Extensions
SBS Transit:
OneSilicon Studio wishes everyone a Happy Deepavali!

messages.text:
[EWL] UPDATE: Full train services on the East-West Line (EWL) will resume on 1 Oct (Tue) 2024 from the start of passenger service hours.

For safety reasons, there will be Temporary Speed Restrictions (TSR) imposed on the repaired sections of the tracks. Passengers are advised to plan for an additional five minutes of travel time for their journeys while travelling to the west on the EWL.

We thank you for your understanding and patience in bearing with the inconveniences during this disruption, and for the care and concern you have shown our ground staff.
- SMRT
